title: Team Pix (recruiting Gold V - Plat I)
body:
Change to the original thread looking for different players due to lack of ranked 5's and dynamic queue restrictions.

Add me or post here if interested (Gold V - Plat I)

Mid/ADC/Support are being tested currently and I'm filling currently so one spot left for now.

replies.body: Hi Im A Support main I reached Plat 5 in preseason and am currently G5 would be a pleasure playing with you guys! :D

Would be interested in both top and support roles as i do enjoy both.
gold last season, gold this season.
Added you to have a chat.
 Cheers,
Andrew
Specifically looking for a support or top laner now.
You must have gone offline as I accepted D:
Hi! I'm a gold 5 jungle main. Would love to join the team man, sent you a friend request in client.
